name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.action.function
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        say:
          content@text: ## Function

        sheet/prompt_function_id:
          label: Name:
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.records
              inputs:
                record_type: automation
                query_required@text:
                  trigger:cerb.trigger.automation.function
          required@bool: yes
          limit: 10
          schema:
            layout:
              filtering@bool: yes
              #paging@bool: no
              headings@bool: no
            columns:
              selection/id:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/_label:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes

  set/load_function:
    function_data__context: automation
    function_data_id@key: prompt_function_id

  return:
    snippet@text:
      function/{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        uri: cerb:automation:{{function_data_name}}
        inputs:
          {% for input in function_data_inputs -%}
          {{input.key}}:
          {% endfor %}

        output: results
        #on_simulate:
        #on_success:
        #on_error:
